          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Diktamen</string>
            <string language="en">Dictation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diktat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ditado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dettatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπαγόρευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dictado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på att skriva meningar som man hör. Meningarna har med familj och familjeliv att göra.Modul 5 - Vem är du? - Familjen.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train to write sentences that you hear. Sentences have with family and family life to do. Module 5 - Who are you? - Family. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">familjen</string>
            <string language="sv">familj</string>
            <string language="sv">familjeliv</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">family life</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir aus, um Programmsätze zu 
schreiben, die Sie hören. Programmsätze haben mit Familie und 
Familienleben zu tun. Modul 5 - Wer sind Sie? - 
Familie. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons pour écrire les phrases 
que vous entendez. Les phrases ont avec la famille et la vie de 
famille pour faire. Module 5 - Qui êtes-vous ? - 
famille. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos para escrever as sentenças 
que você ouve. As sentenças têm com família e vida de 
família fazer. Módulo 5 - Quem são você? - 
família. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo per scrivere le frasi che 
sentite. Le frasi hanno con la famiglia e la vita di famiglia 
fare. Modulo 5 - Chi sono voi? - famiglia. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε να γράψουμε τις προτάσεις που 
ακούτε. Οι προτάσεις έχουν με την οικογένεια και την 
οικογενειακή ζωή που κάνουν. Ενότητα 5 - ποιοι είναι 
εσείς; - Οικογένεια. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos para escribir las sentencias que
usted oye. Las sentencias tienen con la familia y la vida de 
familia hacer. Módulo 5 - ¿Quiénes son usted? - 
familia. Safir.</string>
          </description>
